a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Income share distribution (before tax), World, 1820 to 2021
The income share is the percentage of the national income received by a segment of the population. In this chart,
each segment represents 10% of the population, except for the bottom 50%. Income here is measured before the
payment and receipt of taxes and benefits.
Note: Income is also measured after payment of public and private pensions.
